3i Group Plc, a UK-based investment company with two complementary businesses, infrastructure and private equity, which specializes in core investment markets, has acquired majority stake in EC Waste, LLC, a US-based provider of non-hazardous waste management and disposal services from Post Capital Partners LLC, a US-based private equity firm

Stifel served as financial advisor to EC Waste on the transaction. Winston & Strawn LLP and Pietrantoni Mendez & Alvarez LLC acted as legal advisors, KPMG LLP and BDO USA LLP provided accounting advice and Deloitte Tax LLP provided tax advice to EC Waste.

Deal In Brief

Deal TypePrivate Equity
Sub-CategoryInstitutional Buy-out (IBO)
Deal StatusCompleted: 2021-11-30

Deal Participants

Target (Company)EC Waste, LLC
Acquirer (Company)3i Group plc
